data.description:
Realtime reconciliation for one to many.

Using Create it is possible to add extra fields for linkage and for comparison.

Once the project is generated the code can be enhanced, changing joins and adding more logic to the derived fields.
Workflow can also be expanded as required, both in Create and in the code.

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
The following files need adjusting once built.

Server (TODO comments in code file):
one-to-one-tables-dictionary.kts
one-to-one-view-dictionary.kts
one-to-one-dataserver.kts
one-to-one-pipeline.kts
one-to-one-consolidator.kts
one-to-one-eventhandler.kts

Server (see pipeline.kts for code):
BoTradeBoTradePipelineManager
FoTradeFoTradePipelineManager

Client layout (see below for code):
reconciliation.template.ts
workflow.template.ts

Client grids (TODO comments in x.ts file for each grid):
bo-only.ts
fo-only.ts
in-both-mismatched.ts
in-both-mismatched.column.defs.ts
workflow-open.ts
workflow-open.template.ts
workflow-open.column.defs.ts
workflow-closed.ts
workflow-closed.template.ts
workflow-closed.column.defs.ts
workflow-history.gridOptions.ts (TODO lines are in workflow-history.ts)


////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
In reconciliation.template.ts change the first "vertical" to include size=30%
         <rapid-layout-region type="vertical" size=30%>
and the second instance of "vertical" to "horizontal"
         <rapid-layout-region type="horizontal">

In workflow.template.ts change "tabs" to "horizontal", then add new region with "vertical" beneath it
       <rapid-layout-region type="horizontal">
       <rapid-layout-region type="vertical">
Close this region after "Workflow - Summary"
       </rapid-layout-region>


////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
The following data creates six test csv's
These can be loaded into the system by copying to the folder called TradeData
After the first two files are loaded breaks can be seen.  The final four files correct the data, closing breaks

FO_TRADES.csv
TRADE_ID,VERSION,CURRENCY,NOTIONAL,COUNTERPARTY
1,1,GBP,1000000,Goldmans
2,1,USD,2000000,Barclays
3,1,GBP,2500000,Deutsche
4,1,NZD,123000,JPMorgan
7,1,INR,1200000,Bank Of India


CHILD_TRADES.csv
SUB_ID,SUB_DATA,TRADE_ID,VERSION,CURRENCY,NOTIONAL,COUNTERPARTY
1,Sub1,1,1,GBP,1000000,Goldmans
2,Sub1,2,1,USD,1000000,Barclays
3,Sub2,2,1,USD,500000,Barclays
4,Sub3,2,1,USD,500000,Barclays
5,Sub1,3,1,GBP,2530000,Deutsche
6,Sub1,6,1,AUD,225300000,MorganStanley
7,Sub1,7,1,INR,1200000,BOI

///////////

FO_TRADES_FixRows.csv
TRADE_ID,VERSION,CURRENCY,NOTIONAL,COUNTERPARTY
6,1,AUD,225300000,MorganStanley


CHILD_TRADES_FixRows.csv
SUB_ID,SUB_DATA,TRADE_ID,VERSION,CURRENCY,NOTIONAL,COUNTERPARTY
8,Sub1,4,1,NZD,123000,JPMorgan

///////////

FO_TRADES_FixData.csv
TRADE_ID,VERSION,CURRENCY,NOTIONAL,COUNTERPARTY
7,1,INR,1200000,BOI


CHILD_TRADES_FixData.csv
SUB_ID,SUB_DATA,TRADE_ID,VERSION,CURRENCY,NOTIONAL,COUNTERPARTY
5,Sub1,3,1,GBP,2500000,Deutsche

metadata.comment:
This view is used to identify both missing Back Office trades and to check the match status where there is a linkage.

The derived field for "Match" can only take up to 10 parameters.  If more are needed then two (or more) derived fields can be created: "MatchA" and MatchB".  If this is done the dataserver filters each need to be updated to check all of the Match fields.
